trans-unit.source:
\n

Specifies the reason a thread is waiting.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx x xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for event pair high.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for event pair low.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxx xxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for the scheduler.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for a free virtual memory page.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for a local procedure call to arrive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for reply to a local procedure call to arrive.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xx x xxxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for a virtual memory page to arrive in memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for a virtual memory page to be written to disk.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxx xx xx xxxxxxx xx xxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for system allocation.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for an unknown reason.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for a user request.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx x xxxx xxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The thread is waiting for the system to allocate virtual memory.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x
